description: Broc was chilling with Johnny the other day. Johnny moved in with Broc only about two weeks ago, and, since that time, hasn't done much around the house. Johnny happened to have the day off work so he decided to sit around and watch tv. Broc had other ideas and suggested that he either clean or suck his dick. Johnny had never done either one but sucking a dick seemed much easier than cleaning. Watch virgin Johnny suck his first dick, and....have his ass wrecked for the first time. And when you see Broc, there will be no doubt he can wreck a hole.
title: Super Sized
